title: fps drop after patch 7.20
body: So i have all the time 120 fps while playing... but after patch i have 120 and then for 10 seconds i get 5 fps  and it happens the whole game... someone know anything? thank y {{summoner:7}}

replies.body:
after patch 7.20 i get 5 fps! before the patch i had over 100 fps! 
could you please give a solution for this!!
From 100+ fps at max graphic i'm at 17-18 with lowest graphic setting .... nothing changed on my computer. Others games ? All fine.

Hey, hope this helps you... I was having the same problem and I thought it was some windows update or this new patch, but it seems that some days ago I put my laptop on economizer mode and that was giving me low fps ... i changed it and now its all good :) {{summoner:11}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
hey! how put my laptop on economizer mode
From 100+ fps at max graphic i'm at 17-18 with lowest graphic setting .... nothing changed on my computer. Others games ? All fine. So what can I do ? I know, I'll just stop play that game.
Guys try uninstalling Overwolf, worked for me.
RIOT :League of legends is a wonderful TD game,so we stop you team fighting by just a simple drop of your fps then you will focus more on push tower.HOPE YOU ENJOY IT!!!

This could be a sign that some of those files didn't get updated properly. Try running a quick repair and updating your graphics drivers really quickly. If this doesn't help, go ahead run through the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and test these changes in a custom/practice game first!
i had a similar problem to this where my fps would drop to 5 - 1 fps whenever i engaged into a team fight i just found closing out my client after the game and reopening worked and fixed it
Make sure this only applies to when you play league. If it happens in other games too, your PC might need some work.
